#remove the last occurrence of / and characters followed
sed 's/\(.*\)\/.*/\1/' pb_349773_mapped.falist.txt > pb_349773_mapped.falist

#example
m150314_135807_42153_c100790582550000001823177509091594_s1_p0/42152/0_4512/0_4512
becomes
m150314_135807_42153_c100790582550000001823177509091594_s1_p0/42152/0_4512
